string_table.name: pxabnsnfns11111001101
string_table.string: Use your arrow keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.
To watch this video, use the preview feature in Storyline 360, upload your published output to a server, publish to Review 360, or switch to static video quality.
Streaming video is unavailable for local playback.

slidelink.displaytext: RA ID Checker Role and Responsibilities
Pre-requisites of Being an ID Checker
Chapter One, Registering a New User
Registering a New User in a Single Process
Registering a New User in a Single Process 2
Registering a New User in a Single Process 3
Registering a New User in a Single Process 4
Registering a New User – Photo Upload 1
Registering a New User – Photo Upload 1
Registering a New User – Photo Upload 2
Registering a New User – Photo Upload 3
Registering a New User – Identity Verification 1
Registering a New User – Identity Verification 2
Registering a New User – Identity Verification 3
Assisted Renewal of a Smartcard Certificate
Chapter Three, Assisted Renewal of a Smartcard Certificate
Chapter Four, Additional Information and Final Assessment

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Here we can see an overview for the interface used throughout this eLearning. Make yourself comfortable and familiarise yourself with the functionality of the eLearning by clicking on the ‘i’ icons to reveal information here." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This course will consist of the following chapters:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter One, Registering a New User
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Two, Change of Name
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Three, Assisted Renewal of a Smartcard Certificate
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Four, Additional Information and Final Assessment" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#BABBBA" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="By the end of this course, you should:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be familiar with the Registration Authority ID Checker role, responsibilities and pre-requisite,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be able to log a call on the RA Self Service Portal to request new Smartcards and Smartcard access,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Understand the terms and conditions and process to launch the Care Identity Service (CIS),
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be familiar with creating a new user Smartcard profile and changing a name on the Care Identity Service dashboard, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be familiar with the Smartcard certificate renewal process and be able to repair an expired Smartcard." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The RA ID Checker Roles and Responsibilities are:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Check the identity of users and register new users for a Smartcard using Face to Face Registration,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Input users details and Photo ID into Care Identity Service (CIS),
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Update a user's change of name on their Smartcard, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Renew Smartcard certificates that are due to expire, within 90 Days of Expiry.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="This course will end with the completion of a final assessment covering the topics in this course, requiring to score a pass grade of at least 60%." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="There are pre-requisites to being an ID Checker, such as:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="A valid Smartcard is required,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Complete CIS RA ID Checker training,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Complete RA Policy eLearning,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="RA ID Checker Access – Log onto CIS with Systems Support Access Role, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Use of a camera or works Mobile Phone." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="It is Mandatory that users sign the Terms and Conditions of Smartcard use, and there are three ways of viewing and accepting this, either:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The automatic pop up on first login
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Access via CIS quick link
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Reference to Terms & Conditions in the login box" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="In order to launch the Care Identity Service (CIS), first go to https://portal.national.ncrs.nhs.uk 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Then Select Launch Care Identity Service, this will take you to the dashboard. The Self Service Portal contains a catalogue of forms for you to submit your Smartcard requests to the RA team to authorise.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Let’s see the Self Service Portal Screen for both Pharmacy staff
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="And for GPs
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="There are subtle differences to help keep this portal relevant to your role.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter One, Registering a New User" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="In order to register a new user in a single process we will need to be aware of:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="ID Check Requirements (NHS Employers Standard Document),
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="That users should only have one Smartcard – Before creating a new user profile you can search for a user in CIS using UUID (Smartcard number), name or NI numbers. Select Advanced Search and tick to include closed users,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="And finally, users that left the NHS and are now returning may be closed in CIS in which case they will need to complete full ID checks to have the closed profile reopended.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The simplest way to create a new user request is under Quick Links. On the dashboard page select Create new user 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Once the new user page opens, you will need to enter as many Personal Details as possible, all fields marked with the asterisk * are mandatory. Please also select a title
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Applicant Details – Given Middle and Family Names as they appear in Photo ID." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The next section is there to complete the Identifiers. You must input at least ONE of the identifiers, a NI number is recommended as this can be used to find a user much faster in the event of a lost or stolen card and also for information governance. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="This section needs to be completed with as much information as possible to carry out a duplicate check to ensure the user does not have an existing Smartcard profile.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="This is not where you enter the ID Check Details (see Identity Verification) but if you have the Passport Number and Driving Licence number it should be entered here to assist a duplicate check in the future.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="If the Duplicate Check shows the user has already been Registered then this will show as a Hyperlink and this entry should be used. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="If the entry is open then confirm the details are accurate (including a check of contact details) and update as necessary.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="If the entry is closed then reopen the entry using the Identity Documentation produced" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The next section to complete is Applicant Contact Details, please enter as many contact details as possible. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Contact Details are required for RA Roles (Sponsor, RA Agent, ID Checker etc)
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Work Email etc. only - Local NHS, NHS.net, gov.uk, police.uk. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Click here to see the full CIS email allow list - https://digital.nhs.uk/services/registration-authorities-and-smartcards/care-identity-service/news-and-service-updates/registration-authority-user-guides/email-domain-allow-list
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Not Accepted - Gmail, Hotmail, Yahoo etc
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Next is the new user photo approval, see this image as guidance for the photo criteria.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="All individuals requiring access to NHS CRS need their identity assured ‘beyond reasonable doubt’ the e-GIF Level 3 standard meets this. This requires an individual to produce in person at a face to face meeting relevant combinations of photographic and ‘active in the community’ documentation. See the Registration Authority Agent module for further details.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="When taking a photograph with a mobile phone please take the photograph landscape, with a plain white background, facing forward, above the head and below the shoulders.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The next section is where you upload the photograph you have taken.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="First click the upload or capture photograph button. The Applicant Photo application will then open, it may take a few moments to load.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Then, click the Browse Image button and select the photo file from your PC.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="A red cropping screen appears, this can be adjusted and resized until you get a suitable picture for the card, click on Crop Image when complete.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="If you are not happy with this you can crop again – otherwise click on Confirm Upload when complete.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Click the ‘I verify the photograph to be submitted is a true likeness of the applicant’ tick box
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Address verification, Next step – select the type of document from the drop-down list, then click Add. In this scenario, a financial statement.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Complete the address verification section and finally ID Checkers will need to review the ID Requirements Document for acceptable ID Documents, so once verified click the ‘I verify the original documents were seen and confirmed to be genuine in a face to face meeting with the applicant’ tick box.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The Notes Section is where you can add further relevant notes relating to the user or the task. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Click Grant User to complete registration.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="A Success Message will then appear – Select the ‘Issue Smartcard Later’ option – Please then log a call on the the Self Service Portal under ‘New User Form’ for RA to print and post the Smartcard.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Four, Additional Information and Final Assessment" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Smartcard Dos and Don’t’s:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Always keep your Smartcard safe and secure
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Never disclose your Smartcard Passcode
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Your Smartcard is for your individual use only
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Your Smartcard must never be shared even if you have exactly the same access as a colleague
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Inappropriate access using a shared Smartcard has implications for both the Smartcard user and the individual
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Never leave your Smartcard unattended
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Users retain their Smartcard when they leave an NHS organisation for another, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Immediately report any theft, loss or damage of Smartcards by contacting your RA team by logging a call on the Self Service Portal submitting the form for Lost or Damaged Smartcard
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You have now reached the end of this online training, you will need to complete an assessment exercise to continue. You will be expected to gain a pass mark of 60%. If you do not achieve this, we recommend you to go back through the course to refresh your knowledge before attempting the assessment exercise again." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="We strongly recommend you take a screenshot of this slide using the Printscreen key as evidence of the completion of this assessment." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Registration Authority Contact Details 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="IT Self Service Portal
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Email - itservicedesk@nchc.nhs.uk 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="NCHC Service desk - 01603 508622
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="NHS Digital Additional information (click to view) - Smartcard guidance leaflets
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="http://digital.nhs.uk/article/1125/care-identity-service-guidance-leaflets 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Register to self unlock your Smartcard
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="https://portal.national.ncrs.nhs.uk/portal/dt 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Congratulations you have completed this course, you should now:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be familiar with the Registration Authority ID Checker role, responsibilities and pre-requisite,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be able to log a call on the RA Self Service Portal to request new Smartcards and Smartcard access,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Understand the terms and conditions and process to launch the Care Identity Service (CIS),
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be familiar with creating a new user Smartcard profile and changing a name on the Care Identity Service dashboard, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be familiar with the Smartcard certificate renewal process and be able to repair an expired Smartcard." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Two, Change of Name (Deed Poll/Marriage/Separation)." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Firstly, go to the dashboard, in the search bar enter the user’s UUID, NI or Name and then click Search.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Click on the UUID hyperlink of the user you wish make changes to.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Scroll down the page and click Modify Personal Details.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Make changes as required, update user’s DOB if necessary.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Update the Identifier Section with requested data such as: NI, Passport and drivers licence.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Once changes have been made above, select a reason for the name change, click Add and Complete.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Once completed, ensure you verify. After verification, click Update User.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Once the change of name is complete, log a call on the Self Service Portal under ‘Smartcard Name Change’ to request a new card to be printed for the user. The old card will need to be cut up and destroyed on receipt of working new Smartcard.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Three, Assisted Renewal of a Smartcard Certificate" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="ID Checker Roles and Responsibilities:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Smartcard Certificates expire every 2 years,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Users are prompted to renew their certificate 90 days before expiry,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="All Smartcard users regardless of version of card (especially the 08 series cards – Oberthur) should be able to self renew their certificates via CIS,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The Smartcard will be deactivated upon expiry and therefore cannot be renewed by a Sponsor but can be repaired/renewed by an ID checker using Smartcard Repair, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="If users are unable to renew by themselves then a Sponsor or ID checker can run Assisted Smartcard Renewal Process." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Before renewing any NHS Smartcard, assure yourself of the user’s identity.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="To renew a card it needs access to CIS and preferably Omnikey Card Readers.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Consider renewing at a PC or workstation which is configured to access the NHS spine portal correctly.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Two card readers are needed for this process - integrated keyboard card reader and Omnikey reader, or two Omnikey readers if the keyboard does not have an integrated reader." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="CIS will do a search and load the users profile, scroll down the page to section Smartcard Details.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Ensure the radio button on the card is selected then click Service.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Please log on with your system support access role.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Search for the user, select the affected Smartcard, Click Service.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Select Renew Certificate from the list, click Continue." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="User will be prompted to enter their passcode and click Confirm.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The Smartcard will now renew – when completed we recommend getting the user to test the Smartcard. If you get an error message to say the card has not renewed, log a call on the Self Service Portal under the form Smartcard Expired." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
